name: Retro Night Fukin
description:
Thanks to FM#5059 who creating the arts 

and 

thestach34#9899 for creating the music and sound.

check them on discord, they're great!

Controlling Using Keyboard, if the ui can't be clicked you can use mouse

This game made for Retro Jam (https://itch.io/jam/retro-jam-2021). 

Built in Unity.

We Trying to Remake Friday Night Fukin for GBA.

The Theme are at Level 3 where the player have to beat his own clone.

Happy Playing

Note: If u find bugs, put that down in the comment. and the notes are not really synchronized.

Download for minimum lag!
